mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi') "order_date", buy_sum "buy_sum", name "name", company_name "company_name", order_no "order_no" FROM buyorders bo, companies p, employees e WHERE bo.company_no = p.company_no and bo.emp_id = e.emp_id and buy_sum >= 0 ORDER BY order_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUYORDERS (order_no, order_date, buy_sum, company_no, emp_id ) VALUES ( #{order_no}, To_date(#{order_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi'), #{buy_sum}, #{company_no}, #{emp_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT * from buyorders where buy_sum < 0 order by order_no
mapper.update: UPDATE buyorders SET buy_sum = -1 * buy_sum, return_date = sysdate WHERE order_no = #{order_no}
